requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A visitor interested in exploring barbers and services offered by the shop.
user_goal: Browse the list of barbers and services dynamically loaded from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the barber shop website and expects to see real-time data about barbers and services.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the homepage which loads barbers and services via API calls.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page displays a grid of barbers and a list of services fetched from the backend API.

requirement_tested: A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer setting up the backend server.
user_goal: Verify that the backend connects to the PostgreSQL database using correct environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: The developer starts the backend server expecting it to connect to the PostgreSQL database.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server with environment variables set: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server successfully establishes connection to the PostgreSQL database without errors.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting barbers, services, and client notification records
user_persona: A database administrator initializing the database schema.
user_goal: Set up tables for barbers, services, and notifications in the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Database Tables
narrative_steps.description: The DBA runs SQL scripts to create necessary tables for barbers, services, and notifications.
narrative_steps.action: Execute CREATE TABLE statements for barbers, services, and notifications.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tables 'barbers', 'services', and 'notifications' are created successfully in the database.

requirement_tested: UI for browsing existing barbers with name, photo and specialization details
user_persona: A potential customer looking to choose a barber.
user_goal: View a list of barbers with their photos, names, and specializations.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Barber Section
narrative_steps.description: Jamie goes to the 'Barbers' section to find someone who suits their style.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Barbers' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid of barber cards is displayed, each showing the barber's photo, name, and specialization.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting a Barber Profile
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks on a barber card to learn more about them.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific barber card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the barber's detailed view page with full profile information.

requirement_tested: UI for browsing available services with name, description and pricing information
user_persona: A customer wanting to know what services are offered.
user_goal: Explore the list of services with descriptions and prices.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Services Page
narrative_steps.description: Taylor wants to see what haircuts and treatments are available.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Services' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of service cards appears, each displaying name, description, duration, and price.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Service Details
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks on a service to get more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific service card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal or new page opens showing detailed information about the selected service.

requirement_tested: Functionality to add new barbers including name, contact info, and specialization
user_goal: Add a new barber to the system.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Admin Panel
narrative_steps.description: Admin logs in and navigates to the 'Manage Barbers' section.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to '/admin/dashboard' then click on 'Manage Barbers'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'Add New Barber' form is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Barber Form
narrative_steps.description: Admin fills out the barber's name, contact info, and specialization.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the form fields and upload a photo.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields validate properly; no errors shown.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting New Barber
narrative_steps.description: Admin submits the completed form.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New barber is added to the database and reflected immediately on the barbers page.

requirement_tested: Functionality to add new services including name, description, duration and price
user_goal: Register a new service in the system.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Service Management Area
narrative_steps.description: Admin accesses the service management interface.
narrative_steps.action: Go to the 'Manage Services' section from the admin dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Presented with the 'Add New Service' form.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Service Information
narrative_steps.description: Admin enters service name, description, duration, and price.
narrative_steps.action: Input values into the respective fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Field validations pass with no issues.

narrative_steps.title: Saving New Service
narrative_steps.description: Admin saves the newly entered service.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Service is saved to the database and visible on the services page.

requirement_tested: Integration capability to send WhatsApp notifications to clients
user_persona: An admin scheduling appointments and informing clients.
user_goal: Send a WhatsApp notification to a client regarding their appointment.

narrative_steps.title: Composing Notification Message
narrative_steps.description: Admin composes a custom message for the client.
narrative_steps.action: Enter client phone number and write a personalized message.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message content is ready to be sent.

narrative_steps.title: Sending the Notification
narrative_steps.description: Admin sends the composed message.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Send' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message is dispatched through the WhatsApp API and recorded in the notification log.

requirement_tested: User interface styled with snow-themed background and dim gray interface elements
user_persona: A designer reviewing the UI aesthetics.
user_goal: Confirm visual consistency with snow background and dim gray interface.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Website Layout
narrative_steps.description: Designer inspects the overall look and feel of the website.
narrative_steps.action: Load any page of the website.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page has a repeating snow texture background and all interface components use dim gray color (#2f2f2f).

requirement_tested: Responsive layout suitable for desktop and mobile browsing
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the site on a smartphone.
user_goal: Use the website comfortably on a small screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: User opens the website on their smartphone.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the homepage using a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts to fit the mobile screen with readable fonts and touch-friendly buttons.

requirement_tested: Authentication mechanism for admin access to manage barbers and services
user_persona: An authorized administrator logging in to perform tasks.
user_goal: Securely access the admin dashboard to manage content.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Admin Panel
narrative_steps.description: Admin tries to access restricted areas of the site.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to '/admin/login' and enter valid credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully redirected to the admin dashboard after authentication.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: Someone without credentials tries to reach admin pages directly.
narrative_steps.action: Try to go to '/admin/dashboard' without logging in.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected back to the login page with an access denied message.

requirement_tested: Form validation for barber and service creation inputs
user_persona: An admin entering incomplete data during creation process.
user_goal: Receive helpful feedback when making mistakes in forms.

narrative_steps.title: Leaving Required Fields Blank
narrative_steps.description: Admin leaves some required fields empty before submitting.
narrative_steps.action: Leave 'Name' field blank and tab away from it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline error message appears indicating that the name is required.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Incomplete Form
narrative_steps.description: Admin tries to submit the form despite missing information.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button without filling all required fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Submission is blocked and error messages highlight problematic fields.

requirement_tested: Client-side routing for navigation between barbers, services and management sections
user_persona: A frequent user navigating between different parts of the site.
user_goal: Move smoothly between sections without full page reloads.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Between Sections
narrative_steps.description: User moves from home to barbers, then to services.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Barbers' and then 'Services' in the main navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: URL changes instantly and corresponding views load seamlessly without reloading the whole page.

requirement_tested: Notification log or history tracking sent messages

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Notification History
narrative_steps.description: Admin wants to verify if a message was actually sent.
narrative_steps.action: Open the notification history panel within the admin dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table displays a chronological list of all sent messages with recipient and timestamp.

requirement_tested: Concurrent development server setup for frontend and backend via npm scripts
user_persona: A developer starting work on the project.
user_goal: Run both frontend and backend servers simultaneously for development.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Developer prepares the local environment for development.
narrative_steps.action: Run command `npm run install:all` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed successfully.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Developer begins working on the app locally.
narrative_steps.action: Run command `npm run dev`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers start concurrently and communicate correctly.
